name: AlisteSmartHome
0:
”“Alexa turn on my bedroom lights””
”“Alexa turn off my Air conditioner””
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
On enabling the skill, you will be redirected to a sign in page.
Sign in to your Aliste Account on this page, to sync your current home with Alexa.
You can then control any of your devices using Alexa.
To specify a particular device say the name of the room followed by the switch name.
You can control the fan speed, light brightness, and turn any switch on/off using voice commands on Alexa.

You can try...
POWER On/Off Bedroom Fan
"Alexa, Turn off the Bedroom Fan"
"Alexa, Turn on the Bedroom Fan"

POWER On/Off Kitchen Lights
"Alexa, Turn off the Kitchen Lights"
"Alexa, Turn on the Kitchen Lights"

Change Brightness of Bedroom Lights
"Alexa, set bedroom light brightness to 60"
"Alexa, turn bedroom light brightness at 60"
"Alexa, dim the bedroom lights by 10"

Change Range of Bedroom Fan
"Alexa, set bedroom fan range to 60"
"Alexa, turn bedroom fan range at 60"
"Alexa, reduce the bedroom fan range by 10"
